# Soul Boon (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Incarnum Spells|incarnum]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[Incarnum (Domain)|Incarnum 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (an empty insect cocoon)/DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 minute

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Magic of Incarnum (Wotc), pg. 104

When you cast this spell, you invoke the power of souls unborn to reinforce the recipientâ€™s essentia pool. The creature touched gains 1 point of temporary essentia for every three caster levels, to a maximum of 5 points of essentia at caster level 15th. These temporary essentia points can be used just like normal essentia points for as long as *soul boon* lasts.
